metadata.title: Too Faced Better Than Sex And Diamonds Mascara - Limited Edition Packaging
features: A mascara that you know and love all dressed up in dazzling packaging for a luxurious experience.
Film-forming polymers lock curl in place while acacia senegal tree extract sets volume and peptides condition lashes. The hourglass-shaped brush helps coat every lash.
description: A mascara that you know and love all dressed up in dazzling packaging for a luxurious experience.
